question: I have reddinsh discharge before real menstruation blood starts coming... when do I stop praying and when do I start?
answer:
QUESTION
I have reddinsh discharge before real menstruation blood starts coming. It comes for 3 days and then again it become just a bit reddish discharge. I wipe with toiletpaper after washing, so I know it, otherwise I wouldn't know. My question is when do I stop praying and when do I start?
ANSWER


Share:
The initial red discharge is menses. You should terminate your Salaat then.

Whenever your discharge stops, 10 days or lesser than that, you should take
a bath and resume your Shar'ee obligation of Salaat.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
